issue.title: [CF 1044] TMW doesn't work - Error on logon
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Similarly, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type for your issue, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Logging on
2. Reloading
3. Typing /tmw in chatbox to enter options

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

I expect for TMW to work, so i can see the bars / icons i made and for the options to open.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

version 7.2.1

Do you have an error log of what happened?

yes. This is what i get after logging on or reloading. 1 Error:

Message: [string "TellMeWhen_Group1_ResizeButton:OnLoad"]:1: attempt to index global 'this' (a nil value)
Time: 12/05/14 19:32:52
Count: 1
Stack: [string "*:OnLoad"]:1: in function <[string "*:OnLoad"]:1>

Locals: self = TellMeWhen_Group1_ResizeButton {
0 = <userdata>
}
(*temporary) = <function> defined @Interface\FrameXML\UIParent.lua:3298
(*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = "attempt to index global 'this' (a nil value)"

When i click this error away and type /tmw i will get 28 pages of errors. With the last page beeing this:

Message: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:741: attempt to call global 'GetActiveTalentGroup' (a nil value)
Time: 12/05/14 19:41:23
Count: 4
Stack: [C]: in function `GetActiveTalentGroup'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:741: in function `TellmeWhen_TalentUpdate'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:746: in function `TellmeWhen_GetActiveTalentGroup'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:212: in function `TellMeWhen_Group_Update'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:184: in function `TellMeWhen_Update'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen_options.lua:127: in function `TellMeWhen_LockToggle'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen_options.lua:13: in function `?'
Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:4387: in function <Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:4334>
[C]: in function `ChatEdit_ParseText'
Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:4041: in function `ChatEdit_SendText'
Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:4080: in function `ChatEdit_OnEnterPressed'
[string "*:OnEnterPressed"]:1: in function <[string "*:OnEnterPressed"]:1>

Locals:

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Karasiqt | Imported from CurseForge issue #1044 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: Errortmw.png

Errortmw.png

<p>Error on logging on / reloading</p>


> Posted by CurseForge user Karasiqt

Quote:

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

version 7.2.1

No, you aren't. You're using, at the latest, version 1.2.4, which is over four years old. At the earliest, you're using version 1.0.1, which is over five years old.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
